product_name: The North Face Aconcagua Jacket - Toddler Girls'
long_description: Lightweight and packable, The North Face Aconcagua jacket layers toddler girls in a downy soft, warm, wind- and water-resistant weather barrier while they enjoy their cold-weather adventures. Insulated with 550-fill-power down for an unsurpassed warmth-to-weight ratio; down is the lightest, warmest and most compressible insulation known. Downproof, quick-drying, wind-resistant nylon shell breathes well and is treated for water resistance. Zippered handwarmer pockets warm up chilly fingers quickly. Stand-up collar has velvety soft lining for added warmth; reinforced windflap behind zipper protects against cold air penetration and zipper snags.
short_description: Lightweight and packable, The North Face Aconcagua jacket layers toddler girls in a downy soft, warm, wind- and water-resistant weather barrier while they enjoy their cold-weather adventures.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
